Description:
Adversaries may abuse features of Winlogon to execute DLLs and/or executables when a user logs in.
Winlogon.exe is a Windows component responsible for actions at logon/logoff as well as the secure attention sequence (SAS) triggered by Ctrl-Alt-Delete.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Winlogon Notify Key Logon Persistence
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\software\microsoft\windows nt\currentversion\winlogon\notify\logon' and details like '%.dll'
